title: Loyal, determined, grounded: these are Newcastle United's new heroes, Matty and Sean Longstaff
text:
As the adrenaline that had pumped through his body began to ease and the realisation of what he had done by scoring the winning goal on his debut for Newcastle United hit home, Matty Longstaff looked up to older brother Sean for some reassurance.

It came during a post-match interview and the first question was still being asked, but with the cameras rolling and the broadcast live, for the first time that evening, the young Longstaff looked a little unsure.

Playing football is one thing, scoring the goal that beat Manchester United was unexpected, but that is what he has been training for his whole life. Speaking live on television, that is not something that comes so naturally.

Sean, though,...
description: As the adrenaline that had pumped through his body began to ease and the realisation of what he had done by scoring the winning goal on his debut for Newcastle United hit home, Matty Longstaff looked up to older brother Sean for some reassurance.
